changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.attribute_meta_attribute_authorization AS SELECT base_table.id , res.name AS grouping_agency, cls.name AS classification, b.name AS classifier, att.name AS authorized_attribute, base_table.sequence_number, base_table.text_value, base_table.integer_value, base_table.numeric_value, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.update_date FROM ruleform.attr_meta_attr_auth base_table LEFT JOIN ruleform.agency res ON base_table.grouping_agency = res.id JOIN ruleform.relationship cls ON base_table.classification = cls.id JOIN ruleform.product b ON base_table.classifier = b.id JOIN ruleform.attribute att ON base_table.authorized_attribute = att.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.product_attribute_authorization OWNER TO core; GRANT ALL ON TABLE readable.attribute_meta_attribute_authorization TO core; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.attribute_meta_attribute_authorization TO core_read_write; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.attribute_meta_attribute_authorization TO core_read_only;
